AI Overview
Marketing careers are varied and can involve roles in
digital marketing, brand management, public relations, market research, and advertising. Common entry-level positions include marketing coordinator and social media assistant, while experienced professionals can move into roles like marketing director or chief marketing officer. Key skills include communication, data analysis, and strategic thinking, and career paths can include specializing in areas like SEO, content creation, or brand strategy. 
Entry-level and specialized roles 
  • Marketing Coordinator/Assistant: Provides administrative and marketing support, helps manage campaigns, and handles day-to-day activities.
  • Social Media Assistant/Coordinator
    :     Manages a brand's social media presence and helps develop content strategies.
  • Market Research Analyst
